definition: hey!/(interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
Chinese mugwort or wormwood/moxa/to stop or cut short/phonetic "ai" or "i"/abbr. for 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4], AIDS
interjection of wonder, shock or admiration
(interjection of surprise, pain, annoyance etc)/Oh my!/Uh-oh!/Ah!/Ouch!
interjection of pain or surprise/also written 哎喲|哎哟

sentences.english: The ah, China, really is a troublous times this year.
sentences.chinese: 哎，中國，今年實在是多事之秋。

sentences.english: "Well, it isn't as interesting, " said Hurstwood.
sentences.chinese: “哎，也不如芝加哥有意思，”赫斯渥說。

sentences.english: Ah, I said, when we these children can easily lives?
sentences.chinese: 哎，我說，何時我們這些命苦的小孩才能輕鬆呢？

sentences.english: Han Jia, what did you sing just now?
sentences.chinese: 哎韓佳，剛纔你唱的是什麼歌？

sentences.english: “Well, now I'm chairman emeritus,” Lauder says.
sentences.chinese: “哎，現在我是公司的名譽主席，”勞德說。

sentences.english: Eh, is it the Guanyunting Bridge?
Well, don’t be too narrow-minded. There are lots of good bands out there.
sentences.chinese: 哎，別那麼眼光狹窄嘛，有很多非常不錯的樂隊呢。

sentences.english: Yech…it's a nice day out. And here I am stuck inside the office with all this paper work.
sentences.chinese: 哎，外面天氣多好，我卻得守在辦公室處理這些文件。

sentences.english: Well, last night I had a big argument with Ann.
sentences.chinese: 哎，昨晚我和安大吵了一架。
哎，這就是營銷的智慧啊。

sentences.english: Hey, Daniel, is this your lunch?
Hey, Hong Bing, which New Year paintings did you say are the most famous?
sentences.chinese: 哎，紅兵，你說哪兒的年畫最有名？

sentences.english: Oh, learning it's a small island.
sentences.chinese: 哎，說曹妃甸是一座小島。

sentences.english: Hey, Zhang Jing, who do you think is the happiest at Chinese New Year?
sentences.chinese: 哎，張靜，你覺得過春節的時候誰最高興啊？

sentences.english: Well, perhaps they wear new ball-dresses at home;
sentences.chinese: 哎，也許她們在家穿新舞衣。

definition: interjection or grunt of agreement or recognition (e.g. yes, it's me!)/to sigh
interjection of wonder, shock or admiration
sentence-final particle (abbr. for 呢啊[ne5 a5] or variant of 哪[na5])
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
interjection indicating approval, appreciation or agreement
modal particle indicating that sth is obvious/particle indicating a pause for emphasis
(interjection of surprise, pain, annoyance etc)/Oh my!/Uh-oh!/Ah!/Ouch!
Wow!/sound of child's crying/sound of vomiting
replaces 啊[a5] when following the vowel "u" or "ao"
